This is Jon Pelc. A web developer located in Birmingham, AL with a passion for creating elegant digital solutions and an undying craving for New York style pizza.

Skills:

Wait. Who is Jon Pelc?

That's a great question! I'm a web developer who found his way to Birmingham, AL via northern New Jersey, Boston, and then Atlanta.

I have the knowledge and skills to handle both front and back-end web development but generally prefer to work on the front end side of things. That's because I love building things that people can enjoy interacting with. It's what drives me to do the work that I do. Right now I'm focusing on using React within the MERN stack but I'm always looking for new tools to add to my repertoire. Suggestions are always welcome!

When not coding I like to team up with my girlfriend to spoil our 10 pound Boston Terrier named Violet, invest too much time rooting for the Yankees and 49ers (I promise I wasn't a front-runner as a kid!), playing video games with my friends back up north, and eating at all the great restaurants in the Birmingham area.

If you want to talk about any of the above or any potential project ideas feel free to get in touch with me at any of the links below.
